parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to lock up, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels tight or hard to turn
the power steering does not work properly in cold weather
the steering column shimmers or moves from left to right
the rack and pinion steering fails.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause the steering wheel to lock up, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering column cracks or splits
the steering wheel and column cannot turn in bad weather
the steering column shimmers or moves from left to right.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pads and rotors can cause the vehicle to lose braking power, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The brake pads wear out the rotors
the brake pads are harder than the rotors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle may stall and shut down while driving, potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: typically when the fuel tank is half full

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine cradle falling to the ground can cause serious damage to the vehicle and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: engine cradle falling to the ground.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition module and crank sensor can cause the vehicle to stall, potentially leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
The vehicle may suddenly accelerate, potentially causing accidents or loss of control.
The engine compartment catching on fire can cause serious damage to the vehicle and potentially lead to injuries or fatalities.
The failure of the seat belt retractor can cause the seat belt to become inoperable, increasing the risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The seat belt fails to retract
the seat belt buckle is difficult to undo
the seat belt lap/shoulder will not latch properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, posing a significant risk to the driver, passengers, and other road users.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly and unexpectedly
often without pressing the accelerator pedal

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cruise control failure can cause unintended acceleration, leading to loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: The cruise control system fails to function properly
